product_name: Case Cutlery ARL Dark Oak Peanut Knife
long_description: The ARL Dark Oak Peanut Knife features a multipurpose surgical steel clip blade, a versatile pen blade and an attractive reclaimed-wood handle for use around the house or while camping.
short_description: The ARL Dark Oak Peanut Knife features a multipurpose surgical steel clip blade, a versatile pen blade and an attractive reclaimed-wood handle for use around the house or while camping.
